name: Welcome to [UCCC]!
text:
[Welcome to [UCCC]!]

[The current mod version is [modVersion], compatible with the game version [gameVersion]!

If you are engaging in a multiplayer session, please ensure that all players have the same mod version and game version.

If you encounter any bugs, please join QQ group 718331229 to provide feedback]

choices.text: I have gotton it, let's go!
